meanings.sent1: I left my keys over there on the table.
meanings.sent2: She is standing right there next to the tree.
meanings.sent3: There was a squirrel hiding in the bushes.
meanings.sent4: The stars shine brightly up there in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: I saw a rainbow ending over there by the mountains.

meanings.definition: Used to introduce a sentence or clause in which the verb comes before its subject.
meanings.sent1: There are many books on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: There goes the bus we were waiting for.
meanings.sent3: There goes my chance to win the game.
meanings.sent4: There lies the answer to all our questions.
meanings.sent5: There stands the old oak tree in the middle of the field.
